mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student (s_id,s_name, s_sex, s_age, s_spe) VALUES (#{student_id}, #{student_name}, #{student_sex}, #{student_age}, #{student_spe})
mapper.update: UPDATE student set s_id = #{student_id}, s_name = #{student_name}, s_sex = #{student_sex}, s_age = #{student_age}, s_spe = #{student_spe}, WHERE s_id = #{student_id}
mapper.select: select s_id,s_name, s_sex, s_age, s_spe from student
